channel.title: Recipes on XLabs
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on XLabs

item.title: Deploy
item.description: Ready to build and deploy your Doks website? Follow one of our Hyas guides to different deployment services. Deploy your Hyas site Guides for Netlify, Vercel, GitHub Pages, and more.

item.title: Analytics
item.description: Ready to add Analytics to your Doks website? Follow one of our Hyas guides to different analytics services. Add analytics to Hyas Guides for Plausible, Fathom, Cabin, and Google Analytics.

item.title: CMS
item.description: Ready to connect a Headless CMS to your Doks project? Follow one of our Hyas guides to integrate a CMS.

item.title: DocSearch
item.description: Doks comes with FlexSearch preconfigured out of the box. If you want to use DocSearch in stead, this guide will explain how.

item.title: Versioning
item.description: Looking for an example? Check out the Doks versioning POC!
